What is a good restaurant off of highway 35 in Ames, Iowa?
In: Lifestyle › Dining Out › Good Restaurant
Rate This Answer
Bufords Steak House&BBQ, 2601 E 13th St, Ames, IA 50010,(515) 232-9260 It's just off exit 113 to E13th St. ChaCha on! Answered
